ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T14:40:39 [Issue ID 4000-29839] urn:comicvine:4000-29839 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-15 15:58:51. [Issue ID 44724]
ComicInfo.Summary: *Contents* Video Jack, his dog Kojak, and Damon arrive into a pirate reality. Damon assumes command of a ship, with that reality's Tyrone as his First Mate. Captain Uncle Zach of the enemy ship uses The Remote Control to change reality into a 1980s Prime Time Soap Opera reality. Jack encounters Doreen, now a motorcycle riding intrepid reporter. Jack uses his intelligence to disable Damon's army of Tyrone robots. Facing defeat, Damon uses The Remote Control returning the trio to the dystopian MTV reality. There, Jack and Damon come face to face with Pop Culture.
ComicInfo.Tags: Pop Culture,Doreen Taggert,Kojak,Damon Xarnett,Video Jack,Uncle Zach
ComicInfo.Title: Wipeout Wipeout Wipeout
ComicInfo.Penciller: Keith Giffen,Alan Weiss,Carmine Infantino,Keith Giffen,Alan Weiss,Carmine Infantino
